constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 59 (Thursday, April 1, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. LaMALFA:
H.R. 2323.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, clause 1
[Page H1707]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

title: To prohibit airlines and Amtrak from conditioning the provision of transportation services to any individual on such individual having been vaccinated against COVID-19, and for other purposes.
